description.@en: Some Ogres have reaped the full benefits of their omnivorous diets from birth – mother’s milk, raw meat, dirt, Elven trinkets, swamp gas, human livers and tears – and are infused with great size and physical potency.

effect.@en: You may reference either [BB] or [CB] with any melee weapons you wield, including those which possess the Throwing Quality.
